alert.note: Alert for Eastern Franklin; Eastern Hampden; Eastern Hampshire; Western Hampden; Western Hampshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 4:05PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Hampshire, south central Franklin and northwestern Hampden Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 405 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Russell, or near Westfield, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Chicopee, Westfield, Holyoke, Amherst, Northampton, West Springfield, Ludlow, South Hadley, Easthampton, Belchertown, Ware, Southwick, Granby, Southampton, Hadley, Sunderland, Hatfield, Williamsburg, Huntington and Leverett. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for western Massachusetts.
